question.title: Override springboot JPARepository default timezone
question.body:
Since upgrading to springboot 3.x writes to mysql database are done in UTC (previously it used jvm setting). Is there a way to override this back to JVM.

I have tried using

spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.jdbc.time_zone = Europe/Stockholm
spring.jackson.time-zone= Europe/Stockholm
spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mysql://${block.db.host}:${block.db.port}/${block.db.name}?allowPublicKeyRetrieval=true&useJDBCCompliantTimezoneShift=true&useLegacyDatetimeCode=false&**serverTimezone=Europe/Stockholm

** but to no avail.
